com.client.application.exceptions - package com.client.application.exceptions
This package contains some stock exceptions, which would mostly be used for unit testing the application

Exceptions for the Customer API
com.deloitte.mulesoft.helperclasses - package com.deloitte.mulesoft.helperclasses
This package contains helper classes, intended for use in error handling for MuleSoft Anypoint RESTful API projects.
CustomerNotFoundException - Exception in com.deloitte.customerapi.exceptions
Raised when customers can't be found in the system

CustomExceptionHelper - Class in com.deloitte.mulesoft.helperclasses
This is a helper class, with static methods for working with various aspects of exceptions:
CustomExceptionHelper() - Constructor for class com.deloitte.mulesoft.helperclasses.CustomExceptionHelper
 

E

escapeStringForJSON(String) - Static method in class com.deloitte.mulesoft.helperclasses.CustomExceptionHelper
Helper method for 'escaping' a Java string so that it can be used as a JSON string property.

G

getErrorCode(Class) - Static method in class com.deloitte.mulesoft.helperclasses.CustomExceptionHelper
Static method that takes in an exception class, finds the error code for that class, and returns it.
